content: Hi all, deadline for track proposals for connectathon 25 is Tuesday, July 21st. We have spoken before about targeting MolecularSequence more rigorously. Does anyone have a good idea for a new scenario here?

@Jamie Jones I don't want to hijack your thread but @Tim Owen will Quan be attending the connectathon? If so, do you know what Invitae reports he would like to work on during the sessions? It would be helpful to know... thanks!
Hi @Arthur Hermann , sorry but Quan doesn't have the bandwidth at this time.

Jamie Jones said:

Hi all, deadline for track proposals for connectathon 25 is Tuesday, July 21st. We have spoken before about targeting MolecularSequence more rigorously. Does anyone have a good idea for a new scenario here?

As MolecularSequence ist still messy, i would like to clean up/ define the resource more precisely before doing a track on it.
@Gil Alterovitz would be awesome to get some examples here of the more recent uses you have for MolecularSequence (SequenceResource). Thanks!
